(:action gather ; Gather resources and update their status
  :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?loc - location)
  :precondition (and 
                  (at ?p ?loc)
                  (available ?item ?loc)
                  (not (collected ?item)))
  :effect (and
            (collected ?item)
            (has ?p ?item)
            (selected_location ?loc))

(:action assemble
    ; Universal action to assemble or construct a resource and update its status
    :parameters (?p - person ?resource - object ?location - place ?material - material)
    :precondition (and
                    (at ?p ?location)
                    (has_material ?p ?material)
                    (not (assembled ?resource)))
    :effect (and
              (assembled ?resource)
              (not (has_material ?p ?material))

(:action cover ; Cover an entity using a specified resource
  :parameters (?entity - object ?resource - object)
  :precondition (and (constructed ?entity) (collected ?resource) (not (covered ?entity)))
  :effect (covered ?entity)
)

(:action launch ; Launch or initiate a task with an entity
    :parameters (?actor - person ?entity - object ?location - place)
    :precondition (and
                    (at ?actor ?location)
                    (assembled ?entity)
                    (available ?entity))
    :effect (and
              (in-use ?entity)
              (not (available ?entity))
